tool_description: “Factopia: The World Fact Generator” is an engaging Flask application that serves up a diverse array of facts from around the globe. From the intriguing to the whimsical, and yes, even the so-called “useless” - Factopia is your portal to a world of knowledge, one fact at a time! 🌍
name: Factopia
title: Factopia

api_list.name: fact
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://factopia.p.rapidapi.com/fact"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "factopia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://factopia.p.rapidapi.com/fact"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "factopia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
